channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Premiere
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Premiere

item.title: CVE-2021-28623|2024-08-03T21:47:33.055Z -- adobe -- premiere
item.description: Adobe Premiere Elements version 5.2 (and earlier) is affected by an insecure temporary file creation vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker could leverage this vulnerability to call functions against the installer to perform high privileged actions. Exploitation of this issue does not require user interaction.
